adHeader: Top Notch Pro Male Singer/Pianist - Comes To You!
adDetails: Top-notch pro male San Francisco singer pianist offers (in your home): lessons, tutoring, coaching and rehearsing; also: recording, accompanying and performing. All musical services: $75/hr. Specializing in pop, musical theatre, jazz and improvisation. Also available to help you construct your own cabaret show from start to finish. Please respond for contact/website info, references, links to dozens of performance videos (Rrazz Room, Cafe du Nord, Martuni's, etc.) and other information. Thanks!
